entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:37 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 7:43 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: SSE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening and 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog becoming fog patches in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
